attributes.action: Change all the £1.25 products back to £1
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living crisis is too much right now some people don’t have enough money to pay for bills and food and they are relying on food banks
attributes.background: Change all the local/corner shop stuff to £1 instead of £1.25 eg.chocolate,drinks etc.

rejection.details: The price of consumer goods is a matter for individual producers and retailers, not the Government or Parliament.
